_comment_github_token: Get your token from https://github.com/settings/tokens with 'actions:read' scope
_comment_usage: Use with: meso-forge-mirror mirror --src-type github --src owner/repo --config github-config.json

_example_commands.mirror_to_cache: meso-forge-mirror mirror --src-type github --src owner/repo --tgt-type cache --config github-config.json
_example_commands.mirror_to_local: meso-forge-mirror mirror --src-type github --src owner/repo --tgt-type local --tgt ./conda-repo --config github-config.json
